#general MoccaCalendar.calendar=Calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.title=Calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.defaultCalendarTitle=Other Events MoccaCalendar.calendar.viewall=Overview of all calendars MoccaCalendar.calendar.create=Create new calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist=agenda MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titlepast=Past Events MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titleupcoming=Upcoming Events MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.nopastevents=No past events found.
